medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "I'm Cold Billy, Can't Stop Shaking", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated in r LM: [NA 1990/W.P.]
description: Nude man covered from the waist down in a towel; he faces forward in the direction of the viewer; the words \"I\'m Cold Billy/Can\'t Stop Shaking\" inscribed, UC
